record.title: AUTHORITY TO FILE SECOND-DEGREE AMENDMENTS
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY TO FILE SECOND-DEGREE AMENDMENTS -- (Senate - January 25, 2008)

[Page: S367]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that notwithstanding the provisions of rule XXII, Senators have until 4 p.m. Monday, January 28, to file second-degree amendments.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
